name: InstantReplay
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: instant replay
des: This is a very simple skill to be triggered by an echo button routine which makes a rest call to our instant replay service. This causes the last 13 seconds video recorded at our ping pong table to be captured and uploaded to our company slack ping pong channel. It's only intended to be used internally by our company.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
